channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging bushes, 12th June
item.description:
Overhanging bushes restricting safe passage on footpath, at one point on the bend it forces you onto the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highland Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Pavement damaged by reversing lorries, 12th June
item.description:
The pavement has sunk from vehicles reversing out of the building site of the new builds next to the church. Please get the slabs fixed as they are a trip hazard and raise with the contractor doing the works as this should be repaired at their expense not the taxpayer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cricklade Avenue, Streatham Hill, London

item.title: Bins are stored on street instead of front garden, 12th June
item.description:
This property leaves their bins out blocking the pavement at all times. They should be stored in the front garden but are never taken in. Please address with the residents as rubbish is often strewn everywhere and foxes get into food waste. Number 123

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cricklade Avenue, Streatham Hill, London
